name: Resistance

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Outcast can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Charged_Brawl
display_help: The Outcast has electrocuted you.

name: Lightning_Field
display_help: While active, the Outcast emits a storm of electricity around himself that constantly damages all nearby foes.

name: Havoc_Punch
display_help: The Outcast has electrocuted you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Brawl.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: A Fireball consumes a targeted foe, and any other enemy, in a tight radius. Anyone in that area is burned and damaged over a short period of time.

name: Fire_Imps
display_help: Summons 3 to 6 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.

name: Fire_Shield
display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Ice_Sword
display_help: The Outcast has Slowed your movement and attack rate with his Ice Sword.

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: The Outcast has Slowed your movement and attack rate with his Ice Blast.

name: Freezing_Touch
display_help: You are held, frozen in a block of ice.

name: Frozen_Armor
display_help: While this power is active, you coat yourself in rock hard Frozen Armor. The hardness of the Frozen Armor offers good defense to Smashing and Lethal attack as well as reduces Cold damage. Also, Fire attacks deal slightly less damage. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Rock_Armor
display_help: While this power is active, the Outcast's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make the Outcast highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Outcast.

name: Stone_Mallet
display_help: The Outcast Summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.

name: Stone_Spears
display_help: The Outcast can cause Stone Spears to erupt around an enemy target and all nearby foes. The Stone Spears deal moderate lethal damage.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.
